title: 点券插件 PlayerPoints 的报错问题,在线等解决!很急!
author: 风筱墨
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Renekton67 于 2019-3-12 17:49 编辑 

在使用了playerpoints点券插件后我发现有玩家进入游戏的时候偶然出现以下报错求大佬给解决一下
服务端: paperspigot - 1599
游戏版本: 1.12.2


[16:46:54] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 641/ERROR]: [PlayerPoints] Could not create getter statement.
com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: The last packet successfully received from the server was 66,759,845 milliseconds ago.  The last packet sent successfully to the server was 66,759,845 milliseconds ago. is longer than the server configured value of 'wait_timeout'. You should consider either expiring and/or testing connection validity before use in your application, increasing the server configured values for client timeouts, or using the Connector/J connection property 'autoReconnect=true' to avoid this problem.

        at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl.java:2484) ~[patched_1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1599]
        at com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement.executeInternal(PreparedStatement.java:1858) ~[patched_1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1599]
        at com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement.execute(PreparedStatement.java:1197) ~[patched_1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1599]
        at lib.PatPeter.SQLibrary.Database.query(Database.java:261) ~[?:?]
        at lib.PatPeter.SQLibrary.Database.query(Database.java:278) ~[?:?]
        at org.black_ixx.playerpoints.storage.models.MySQLStorage.getPoints(MySQLStorage.java:85) ~[?:?]
        at org.black_ixx.playerpoints.storage.StorageHandler.getPoints(StorageHandler.java:39) ~[?:?]
        at org.black_ixx.playerpoints.PlayerPointsAPI.look(PlayerPointsAPI.java:102) ~[?:?]

        at com.Zrips.CMI.Modules.Placeholders.Placeholder.updatePlaceHolders(Placeholder.java:431) ~[?:?]

问题已自行解决,请勿回复!!
解决方法:更换最新版paperspigot服务端为1606

replies.author: 8Mi丶以勒
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 8yl丶以勒 于 2019-3-12 17:34 编辑 

设置MySQL有没有安装前置SQLibrary? 
那有的话SQLibrary版本多少？官网最新版本 7.1
还有PlayerPoints版本是多少的？官网最新版本是 2.1.5
我的服务器用的是SQLibrary-7.1和PlayerPoints-2.1.5

下面是我的设置

storage: MySQL
mysql:
  host: 127.0.0.1
  port: 3306
  database: xx_mcs_global
  user: xx_root
  password: pwd
  table: PlayerPoints复制代码
